tool_description: Get random anime pfp and gif's using the anyanime api
name: Any Anime
title: Any Anime

api_list.name: anime gif
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://any-anime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/gif"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "any-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
